Detailed Description

STDPMechConfig: mechanism configurator for STDPMech.

AdditiveSTDPNegExpFunction class definition One negative exponential for each branch (depression and potentiation). Weight change for potentiation (dt > 0): +cP_ * exp(- dt * inv_tauP_) Weight change for depression (dt < 0): +cD_ * exp(dt * inv_tauD_) No weight dependence.
